title: Syria Backs Iran's "Right To Self-Defense" After Israeli Strikes
content: Syria condemned Israeli air strikes against Iran on Saturday, saying it affirmed its ally's right to self-defence.
summary: Syria condemned Israeli air strikes against Iran on Saturday, saying it affirmed its ally's right to self-defence.

title: 6 Russian Convicts Escape Prison Through Secret Tunnel, Manhunt Launched
content: Russian authorities announced a manhunt on Saturday after six convicts escaped their correctional facility through a secret tunnel.
summary: Russian authorities announced a manhunt on Saturday after six convicts escaped their correctional facility through a secret tunnel.

title: Israel's Long-Distance Strike On Iran Has Parallels To 1981 Attack On Iraq
content: An Israeli attack on Iran targeted military sites today, killing two soldiers, almost a month after Israel vowed to avenge a missile barrage that raised fears of a full-scale Middle East war. The airstrikes hit Iran's missile manufacturing units.
summary: An Israeli attack on Iran targeted military sites today, killing two soldiers, almost a month after Israel vowed to avenge a missile barrage that raised fears of a full-scale Middle East war. The airstrikes hit Iran's missile manufacturing units.

title: Seoul Spending $327 Million To Stop "Lonely Deaths" Epidemic. What It Is
content: Seoul authorities, while announcing the $327 million initiative this week, stated that they want to "create a city where no one is lonely."
summary: Seoul authorities, while announcing the $327 million initiative this week, stated that they want to "create a city where no one is lonely."

title: "Blatant Violation Of Sovereignty": Hamas After Israel Strikes Iran

title: US Sends Back Illegal Indian Immigrants On Chartered Flight Ahead Of Polls
content: The US hired a chartered flight to deport Indian nationals who were staying in the country illegally, the Department of Homeland Security has said, noting that this has been done in cooperation with the Indian government.
summary: The US hired a chartered flight to deport Indian nationals who were staying in the country illegally, the Department of Homeland Security has said, noting that this has been done in cooperation with the Indian government.

title: "Rejecting Escalation": Saudi Arabia Condemns Israel's Strikes On Iran
content: Saudi Arabia condemned Israeli strikes on military targets in Iran on Saturday, warning against any further expansion of the conflict in the Middle East.
summary: Saudi Arabia condemned Israeli strikes on military targets in Iran on Saturday, warning against any further expansion of the conflict in the Middle East.

title: Video Of Ballots Of Trump Being Destroyed 'Fake', Russia Responsible: US
content: Russian actors were behind a viral video falsely showing mail-in ballots for Donald Trump being destroyed in the swing state of Pennsylvania, US officials said.
summary: Russian actors were behind a viral video falsely showing mail-in ballots for Donald Trump being destroyed in the swing state of Pennsylvania, US officials said.

title: Assassinations, Cyberattacks: How Israel Attacked Iran Over The Years
content: From hitjobs to sabotages and cyberattacks, Israel has either been blamed for or has itself claimed a variety of attacks against Iran.

title: All You Need To Know About NASA-ISRO Mission's Radar Antenna Reflector
content: The radar antenna reflector for the NASA-ISRO Synthetic Aperture Radar (NISAR) mission arrived at the spacecraft integration and test facility of the Indian Space Research Organisation (ISRO) in Bengaluru this week.
summary: The radar antenna reflector for the NASA-ISRO Synthetic Aperture Radar (NISAR) mission arrived at the spacecraft integration and test facility of the Indian Space Research Organisation (ISRO) in Bengaluru this week.

title: What Scientists Say About Holy Grail Cup Found Where Indiana Jones Was Filmed
content: Archaeologists have disclosed the origin of the famous "holy grail" cup, which was found with 12 human skeletons at the spot in Jordan where the 1989 film Indiana Jones and The Last Crusade was filmed.
summary: Archaeologists have disclosed the origin of the famous "holy grail" cup, which was found with 12 human skeletons at the spot in Jordan where the 1989 film Indiana Jones and The Last Crusade was filmed.

title: "Stop Donating To Wikipedia, Controlled By Far-Left Activists": Elon Musk
content: Billionaire entrepreneur Elon Musk has appealed to the public to stop donating to the internet 'encyclopaedia' Wikipedia for allegedly letting itself be misused as a platform "controlled by far-Left activists."
